title: Muthyam & Ruby Vanki Ring - A Timeless Telugu Tradition
materials: Natural Rubies (Central cabochon and surrounding stones)
Natural Pearls (Muthyam). Features a traditional Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This exquisite vanki ring showcases a classic floral motif design. The central ruby is surrounded by a halo of polki diamonds, followed by a ring of vibrant rubies and lustrous pearl stones. The open setting maximizes the brilliance of each stone. The floral arrangement echoes traditional Telugu jewelry design principles.
colors: and iridescent white pearls. The warmth of the gold complements the cool tones of the pearls and the fiery rubies creating a rich and vibrant palette.
occasions: and other special occasions. This ring is a statement piece suitable for both traditional and contemporary attire.
description: This vanki ring is a unique blend of traditional Telugu craftsmanship and timeless elegance. The use of natural rubies, polki diamonds, and pearls signifies prosperity and good fortune. The Hyderabadi polish gives the ring a vintage charm, making it a valuable heirloom piece to be treasured for generations. The piece showcases the rich jewelry heritage of Andhra Pradesh and Telangana region.
